comments:
Using I200311192030 I right clicked on plugin.xml, selected Export, selected 
one plug-in, deployable zip file, include source, specified a filename, and 
pressed Finish. Eclipse switched to the Progress view which said 'ERROR: PDE 
Export: An internal error occurred during: "PDE Export"'. The .log file is 
copied below.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Nov 20, 2003 10:20:59.839
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "PDE Export".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.io.File.<init>(Unknown Source)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.builder.ModelBuildScriptGenerator.filterNonExist
ingSourceFolders(ModelBuildScriptGenerator.java:705)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.builder.ModelBuildScriptGenerator.generateSRCTar
get(ModelBuildScriptGenerator.java:677)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.builder.ModelBuildScriptGenerator.generateBuildJ
arsTarget(ModelBuildScriptGenerator.java:579)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.builder.ModelBuildScriptGenerator.generateBuildS
cript(ModelBuildScriptGenerator.java:148)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.builder.ModelBuildScriptGenerator.generate
(ModelBuildScriptGenerator.java:110)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.exports.PluginExportJob.makeScript
(PluginExportJob.java:148)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.exports.PluginExportJob.doExport
(PluginExportJob.java:96)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.exports.BaseExportJob.doExports
(BaseExportJob.java:179)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.exports.BaseExportJob.run
(BaseExportJob.java:133)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:62)


build.properties says:

source.sds.jar = src/
bin.includes = plugin.xml,\
               about.html,\
               icons/,\
               audio/,\
               sds.jar


I think I see the problem, I don't actually have a src/ directory (I call mine 
Source/Java). After fixing build.properties to the following, the export 
completed without error:

bin.includes = plugin.xml,\
               about.html,\
               icons/,\
               audio/,\
               sds.jar
source.sds.jar = Source/Java/
output.sds.jar = build/
src.includes = Source/Java/

Good information in your bug report, thanks.
Fixed and released to HEAD.
*** Bug 46078 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
